summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) involved in the Epstein case, indicating they were on vacation until August 12, 2019, and providing contact information for other AUSAs on the case.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: The primary sender of the out-of-office email, indicating they are on vacation but involved in the Epstein case.

events.title: AUSA Out of Office
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney working on the Epstein case sends an automatic out-of-office reply indicating they are on vacation until August 12, 2019.

keyFacts: The document is an automated out-of-office email reply dated August 10, 2019.
The sender is an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) involved in the Epstein case.
The AUSA was on vacation until August 12, 2019, but indicated they would have limited email access.
The email directs urgent matters to other AUSAs on the Epstein case.
This shows ongoing legal activity in the Epstein case as of August 2019.
